title: Designated Survivor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this spawns, originally spawns as another town role.
- Spawns in any town slot.
- If this is the last remaining town member, become this slot is revealed.
- If you reveal you are the designated survivor publicly or in whispers, you will be modkilled for violating secrecy. The Jailor's chill tho, but he can't reveal your secret.
- You cannot be executed by the Jailor due to your status.
- You retain the abilities and attributes of your original role, as well as another role of one of the following subalignments, excluding your own: investigative, protective, killing, support, and power.
- You can use protective abilities on yourself an unlimited amount of times
- You have unlimited charges of killing abilities
- You can multitask
- You may escape the town, resulting in a town victory or stalemate if 2 or more REF members and at least one non-town supportive neutral are still alive

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer OR Get the hell out of this place, no matter the cost.
